text:
She was hailed as the “wink sensation” and also the national crush. When the song from Priya Prakash Varrier’s debut film was released, her wink made many people go weak in their knees. So much so, that the video had taken social media by storm, and for days, people were only talking about her.
A few days ago, another video from the movie was released that grabbed many eyeballs yet again. This time Priya Prakash Varrier was seen kissing her co-star Abdul Rauf. However, unlike her last video, this one is getting brutally trolled on social media.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Interestingly, the video has more dislikes than likes.
Now, that movie Oru Adaar Love is all set for its release on Valentines day, it has become the most anticipated film. According to Most Anticipated Indian Films and Shows list on IMDb, Oru Adaar Love is at the top spot, leaving behind Ranveer Singh’s Gully Boy, which is on the second.
title: Unlike The Wink, Priya Varrier's Kissing Scene Gets Trolled, Gets More Dislikes Than Likes!
description: A few days ago, another video from movie Oru Adaar Love was released that grabbed many eyeballs yet again. This time Priya Prakash Varrier was seen kissing her co-star Abdul Rauf. However, unlike her last video, this one is getting brutally trolled on social media.
